column1: March 9 (Reuters) - Intel Corp is considering a range of acquisition options that could include a possible bid for Broadcom Ltd
column2: the Wall Street Journal reported on Friday
column3: citing people familiar with the matter.

column1: Intel was rooting for Broadcom to fail in its attempt to buy Qualcomm Inc
column2: given that the combined company would be a competitive threat to Intel

column1: (on.wsj.com/2HnCaZk) (Reporting by Arunima Banerjee in Bengaluru)ima Banerjee in Bengaluru)
